name: Cocalicola
description:
Welcome to Isle Cocalicola!

Controls: WASD to move, SPACE to jump

Left Click to interact, place goods, buy from the kitten.

Right Click to pick up items. Mouse wheel to rotate inventory.

Click on the boat to set sail, click along the bottom of the boat to 'paddle'

Click the island to return, don't stay out too long or the jellyfish will come!

If you perish, you'll need to fix the boat, use WASD/Arrows and Enter/Space to swap tiles until you complete the puzzle repairs.

Click on the dark fishing spots to catch fish. 5 fish gets you a random item (volume of random items is low due to time constraints!)

Windows download coming soon, it will probably work better than the embedded version. No sound due to jam, but I plan to change that.

Created for https://itch.io/jam/sylvies-jam-1, it was a lot of fun. This was my first 3D game so there will be bounds of things to improve!
